constraints.name: The Best Years of Our Lives

conversation.speaker: SYSTEM
conversation.text:
For fans who enjoyed the sound of war and powerful performances, I recommend 'Saving Private Ryan' (1998). Starring Tom Hanks and Matt Damon, the movie offers a heart-wrenching account of World War II.

If you're interested in historical battle tales with stunning visuals, 'Red Cliff' (2008) is another excellent choice. Directed by John Woo, it stars Wei Zhao and Takeshi Kaneshiro, amongst others.
